title: Canterbury Country Cardinals
text:
The Canterbury Country Cardinals were a <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a> <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> club that represented <a href="Canterbury%2C%20New%20Zealand">Canterbury</a> in the <a href="Lion%20Red%20Cup">Lion Red Cup</a> from 1994 to 1996. They were administered by the <a href="Canterbury%20Rugby%20League">Canterbury Rugby League</a>.
The Country Cardinals drew from the Halswell, Papanui, Hornby, Lincoln University and Marist-Western Suburbs clubs.
Notable players.
Notable players included <a href="Glen%20Coughlan">Glen Coughlan</a>, <a href="Phil%20Bancroft">Phil Bancroft</a>, <a href="Logan%20Edwards">Logan Edwards</a>, <a href="Shane%20Endacott">Shane Endacott</a>, <a href="Paul%20Johnson%20%28New%20Zealand%29">Paul Johnson</a>, <a href="Blair%20Harding">Blair Harding</a>, <a href="Mark%20Nixon%20%28rugby%20league%29">Mark Nixon</a>, <a href="Henry%20Suluvale">Henry Suluvale</a>, <a href="David%20Kidwell">David Kidwell</a>, <a href="Marty%20Crequer">Marty Crequer</a>, <a href="Tevita%20Vaikona">Tevita Vaikona</a> and <a href="Aaron%20Whittaker">Aaron Whittaker</a>.
